name: Gujžina - Slovenska kulinarika na vegetarijansko veganski način

reviews.text:
We were just in time to get a table before you needed a reservation, the previous night they were full but glad we returned and tried again. Big menu, all vegetarian with vegan options.
A mix of meat substitute (eg seitan steak) and vegetable based dishes. Really enjoyed the dodoli tris, and my friend enjoyed the mushroom gnocchi. Very friendly and attentive waiters, despite every table being full.
We tried the layer cake too, Potica, which was very nice, not what I expected but I liked it!

A great opportunity to eat Slovenian traditional dishes as a vegetarian. The waiter was very kind, and made us try traditional dessert with pumpkin seed ice cream. I strongly recommend this restaurant!!

I had a great experience. The food was tasty and also local. It was a great opportunity to eat to local cuisine while eating vegan. They even have some good local wines.

The service was good and when asked about the dishes they gave plenty of explanation about it. I also let them choose the dishes and they didn’t disappoint!

The food here was so good. We shared the dödöljev tris and the bograč and they were both great and perfect together as suggested on the menu. I also tried the homemade grape juice, which was great too. I'd definitely recommend here if you're looking for veggie/vegan versions of slovenian food.

Amazing to have traditional Slovenian cuisine! Everything was vegetarian and there was plenty of vegan options too!
Couldn't not try the traditional layered cake and it was yummy!
